character.name: Marana Fireheart
character.bio: Marana is a fiercely independent woman who grew up in the backstreets of her home town. Forced to flee because she was too active in her chosen profession, she has come to new lands to seek her fortune. Devious, resourceful, personable and intelligent, she can break in almost anywhere â€“ and talk her way out afterwards! She is determined to get rich any way she can.
